about_the_game:
The gods of DKO crash into SMITE, with Susano slicing onto the battleground (in the cutest way possible) as Stormy Chibi Susano! Get Stormy Chibi Susano for FREE in SMITE, just by buying any Divine Knockout (DKO) Founders Edition.

You’ll only receive Stormy Chibi Susano in SMITE on the platform you purchase the DKO Founders Edition on, so make sure you purchase the Founders Edition on the platform that you want to play SMITE on! Dive into DKO and get brawling today!

DKO is a brand-new, fast-paced Brawler set in a stylized world of Gods and Mythology. DKO combines physics-based combat, a vibrant roster of deities, and Third-Person combat that puts you right in the heart of the action!

You’ll only receive Stormy Chibi Susano in SMITE on the platform you purchase the DKO Founders Edition on, so make sure you purchase the Founders Edition on the platform that you want to play SMITE on! Dive into DKO and get brawling today!

DKO is a brand-new, fast-paced Brawler set in a stylized world of Gods and Mythology. DKO combines physics-based combat, a vibrant roster of deities, and Third-Person combat that puts you right in the heart of the action!

name: SMITE Stormy Chibi Susano

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Phenom II X3, 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Unleash a fearsome typhoon, in the cutest way possible! Get Stormy Chibi Susano for FREE in SMITE, just by buying any Divine Knockout (DKO) Founders Edition. You’ll also unlock the god Susano and his voice pack. Dive into DKO and get brawling today!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
